entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
